name: Code Front End Dashboard Reservation Platform Agent
shortDescription: A platform to manage reservations, focusing on scheduling, client availability, and payment integration.
fullDescription: This agent is designed to create a robust reservation platform with an intuitive interface for managing client bookings, availability, and payments. It supports real-time scheduling, client management, and payment processing. The platform is built to be responsive and scalable, suitable for a wide range of booking services, from restaurants to hotels. Key features include a calendar for managing reservations, availability settings, client profile management, and integration with payment gateways.
UseCases: 1. A business needing an online reservation system for clients to book services based on availability. 2. A restaurant or hotel looking for an automated way to manage client bookings and payments. 3. A service provider needing to offer an easy-to-use platform for clients to view availability and schedule appointments.
